resources.string: Auto tracking is set on foot. Can be modified in settings.
Auto tracking is disabled. Can be modified in settings.
Would you like to automatically track on foot? You can later change this in settings.
Would you like to automatically track on foot? Tracking requires location permission. You can later change this in settings.
Would you like to enabled automatic uploading of tracked data on wifi?\nYou can later change this in settings.
Signals can automatically track and upload data.\nTo do so, Signals needs access to your GPS position\nYou can change when to track or upload any time settings.
Signals is a wifi and cell network tracking game with challenges. All data is securely uploaded to the server and then anonymized and stored inside the database.
Signals requires google signin for access management and identifying from who the upload comes so personal statistics can be generated. Signals uses only id from Google, nothing else.
